import { Playground, PropsTable } from "docz";
import Toggle from "./Toggle";

# Toggle

HTML checkbox styled as toggle button

<PropsTable of={Toggle} />

## Basic usage

<Playground>
  <Toggle label="Toggle" checkedOption="On" uncheckedOption="Off" />
</Playground>

## As a row

<Playground>
  <Toggle
    label="Toggle"
    checkedOption="Enabled"
    uncheckedOption="Disabled"
    row
  />
</Playground>
